001package io.jstach.rainbowgum.jansi;
002
003import org.fusesource.jansi.AnsiConsole;
004
005import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogConfig;
006import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogEncoder;
007import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogOutput.OutputType;
008import io.jstach.rainbowgum.spi.RainbowGumServiceProvider;
009import io.jstach.svc.ServiceProvider;
010
011/**
012 * Jansi initializer.
013 */
014@ServiceProvider(RainbowGumServiceProvider.class)
015public class JansiInitializer implements RainbowGumServiceProvider.Configurator {
016
017        /**
018         * Jansi disable property.
019         */
020        public static String JANSI_DISABLE = "jansi.disable";
021
022        /**
023         * No Arg for service loader.
024         */
025        public JansiInitializer() {
026        }
027
028        @Override
029        public boolean configure(LogConfig config) {
030                if (installJansi(config)) {
031                        AnsiConsole.systemInstall();
032                        config.encoderRegistry()
033                                .setEncoderForOutputType(OutputType.CONSOLE_OUT,
034                                                () -> LogEncoder.of(JansiLogFormatter.builder().build()));
035                }
036                return true;
037        }
038
039        private boolean installJansi(LogConfig config) {
040                if (!System.getProperty("surefire.real.class.path", "").isEmpty()) {
041                        return false;
042                }
043                var disableProperty = Boolean.parseBoolean(config.properties().valueOrNull(JANSI_DISABLE));
044                if (disableProperty) {
045                        return true;
046                }
047                return true;
048        }
049
050}
